skillTree.localised_description: The High Elves possess a natural skill that far outstrips the prowess of ordinary mortals.
The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.
Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: The sword is the axis of the world and its power is absolute.
Panic and fear are things that happen to others.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
Those who seek greater understanding of the world may turn to Hoeth for knowledge and guidance.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Shem's Burning Gaze"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Shem's Burning Gaze Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Shem's Burning Gaze Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: The Wizard draws wholesome energies from the soil, imbuing companions with the natural resilience of the earth.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Earth Blood"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Earth Blood Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Earth Blood Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Harmonic Convergence"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Harmonic Convergence Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Harmonic Convergence Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Spirit Leech"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Spirit Leech Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Spirit Leech Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 5
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 10
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 25

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 1
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 2
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 18% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: In society, one must learn to conform. Or not, as the case may be…
Good ideas oft-times need vocal, public support to turn them into reality.
This one is happy to follow and let other, more energetic types, lead from the front.

unit_ability.onscreen_name: Djaf's Incantation of Cursed Blades Upgraded

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Stiff, starched, formal. Inflexible.
Industrious and productive, this one can turn ideas into gold - sometimes literally.
Never short of new ideas, or new ways of looking at old problems.
A subversive agitator, and clinically non-conformist to boot.
Armies can be mended as surely as people can, up to a point of course.
"I see something wrong and I fix it with my hands."
Some warriors are like rocks - hard and immovable. This one is like jelly…
This one moves like lightning, ducking and twisting to avoid their opponent's blows.
Armour is just a formality when you're as hard as nails and as tough as old boots.
It's surprising that this one can even lift a pen, let alone a sword.
Chance is like magic - it can be harnessed to the individual's will.
"If you need anything, there are guards outside the doors. Many guards."

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "There are people living inside Morrslieb - right inside, yes - and they want to take over the world!"
Every fibre of their being is charged and ready for action - wherever, whenever.
Through their veins a charge is racing. Energy, filling the ominous void within.
"Look, it's terribly cold. Can we get those things as far away from me as possible? Yes, that's right - on the flank."

effects.description:
Melee defence: -8 for Phoenix units
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The prospect of battle fills the phoenix with a brisk energy that's somewhat infectious...

effects.description:
Melee defence: +8 for Phoenix units
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Battle, you say? Today? Marvellous! Bring me my phoenix - let's get killing!"

effects.description:
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +50%
	(accompanying Lord)

Melee defence: +12 for Phoenix units
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one is something of an eccentric; their erratic behaviour has upset powerful people, which is seldom a good idea.

effects.description:
Upkeep: +20% for Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lion of Chrace units
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Through his words and deeds, this one has made a name for himself within noble Elven circles.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lion of Chrace units
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +5 for Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Enlightenment is achieved by mastering not only the body, but the soul. Only then can a warrior truly understand the value of life."

effects.description:
Upkeep: -20% for Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lion of Chrace units
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units
	(Hero's army)

Recruitment duration: -1 turn for Swordmasters of Hoeth units (minimum 1)
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Don't take this one along if you need to get away quickly… or maybe you should…
The very illustration of Elven perfection. What a git!
Even for a long-limbed, long-lived Elf, this character is a fine specimen.
